description: Warper for RA8876  tft lcd display
name: ra8876

@/drawline.description: Draw a line from start points X1 Y1 to end points X2 Y2. Note the start and end points should be within active window

@/drawrect.description: Draw a square from start points X1 Y1 to end points X2 Y2. Note the start and end points should be within active window

@/fillrect.description: Draw a square from start points X1 Y1 to end points X2 Y2 using colour RGB565 format.

@/getcursor.description: Get the coordinate of the text cursor

@/selectinternalfont.description: Select one of 3 internal font size

@/setcursor.description: Set the coordinate for text cursor
